tags.name: needle-menu
tags.description:
`The <needle-menu>` web component. A lightweight cross-platform menu that contains built-in functionality and can be extended.

This element is intended as an internal UI primitive for hosting application
menus and buttons. Use the higher-level `NeedleMenu` API from the engine
code to manipulate it programmatically.

![Needle Engine Logo](data:image/svg+xml;base64,) _Needle Engine_

tags.name: needle-button
tags.description:
A <needle-button> can be used to add VR, AR or Quicklook buttons to your website without having to write code.

![Needle Engine Logo](data:image/svg+xml;base64,) _Needle Engine_

attributes.name: ar
attributes.description: Create an AR button

attributes.name: vr
attributes.description: Create a VR button

attributes.name: quicklook
attributes.description: Create a QuickLook button for iOS

attributes.name: unstyled
attributes.description: When present, the component won't add its default styles

tags.name: needle-engine
tags.description:
The <needle-engine> web component creates and manages a Needle Engine context for rendering a 3D scene using threejs. The context is created when the `src` attribute is set and disposed when the element is removed from the DOM; set the `keep-alive` attribute to `true` to prevent cleanup. The context is accessible as `document.querySelector('needle-engine').context`. See https://engine.needle.tools/docs/reference/needle-engine-attributes

![Needle Engine Logo](data:image/svg+xml;base64,) _Needle Engine_

attributes.name: src
hash
attributes.description: Optional. String attached to the context for caching/identification.

attributes.name: camera-controls
dracoDecoderPath
attributes.description: Override the default draco decoder path location.

attributes.name: dracoDecoderType
attributes.description: Override the default draco library type.

attributes.name: ktx2DecoderPath
attributes.description: Override the default KTX2 transcoder/decoder path

attributes.name: tone-mapping
attributes.description: Tonemapping mode

attributes.name: tone-mapping-exposure
attributes.description: Exposure multiplier for tonemapping

attributes.name: background-blurriness
attributes.description: Blurs the background image. Strength between 0 (sharp) and 1 (fully blurred).

attributes.name: background-color
attributes.description:
CSS background color value to be used if no skybox or background image is provided.
@example "background-color='#ff0000'" will set the background color to red.

attributes.name: environment-intensity
attributes.description: Intensity of environment lighting

attributes.name: keep-alive
attributes.description: Prevent Needle Engine context from being disposed when the element is removed from the DOM

attributes.name: background-image
attributes.description: URL to .exr, .hdr, .png, .jpg to be used as skybox. Can also be a magic name for built-in skyboxes, or a FastHDR URL from cdn.needle.tools.

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/studio_small_09_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: Studio Small - neutral product lighting

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/brown_photostudio_02_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: Brown Photo Studio - warm tones

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/the_sky_is_on_fire_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: The Sky is on Fire - dramatic sunset

attributes.name: environment-image
attributes.description: URL to .exr, .hdr, .png, .jpg to be used for lighting. Can also be a magic name for built-in environments, or a FastHDR URL from cdn.needle.tools.

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/studio_small_09_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: Studio Small - neutral product lighting

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/brown_photostudio_02_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: Brown Photo Studio - warm tones

values.name: https://cdn.needle.tools/static/hdris/the_sky_is_on_fire_2k.pmrem.ktx2
values.description: FastHDR: The Sky is on Fire - dramatic sunset

attributes.name: background-intensity
attributes.description: Intensity multiplier for the background image.

attributes.name: transparent
attributes.description: Enable/disable renderer canvas transparency.

attributes.name: contact-shadows
attributes.description: Enable/disable contact shadows in the rendered scene

attributes.name: focus-rect
attributes.description: Defines a CSS selector or HTMLElement where the camera should be focused on. Content will be fit into this element.

attributes.name: clickthrough
attributes.description: Allow pointer events to pass through transparent parts of the content to the underlying DOM elements.

attributes.name: auto-fit
attributes.description: Automatically fits the model into the camera view on load.

attributes.name: auto-rotate
attributes.description: Automatically rotates the model until a user interacts with the scene.

attributes.name: autoplay
attributes.description: Play animations automatically on scene load

attributes.name: onloadstart
attributes.description: Emitted when loading begins for the scene. The event is cancelable â€” calling `preventDefault()` will stop the default loading UI behavior, so apps can implement custom loading flows.

attributes.name: onprogress
attributes.description: Emitted repeatedly while loading resources. Use the event detail to show progress.

attributes.name: onloadfinished
attributes.description: Emitted when scene loading has finished.

attributes.name: onxr-session-ended
attributes.description: Emitted when an XR session ends.

attributes.name: onenter-ar
attributes.description: Emitted when entering an AR session.

attributes.name: onexit-ar
attributes.description: Emitted when exiting an AR session.

attributes.name: onenter-vr
attributes.description: Emitted when entering a VR session.

attributes.name: onexit-vr
attributes.description: Emitted when exiting a VR session.

attributes.name: onready
attributes.description: Emitted when the engine has rendered its first frame and is ready.

attributes.name: onxr-session-started
attributes.description: Emitted when an XR session is started. You can do additional setup here.
